lines.text: X1 , Y1 , X2 , Y2 = long long
lines.code: long long X1 , Y1 , X2 , Y2 ;

lines.text: read X1 then Y1 then X2 then Y2
Roz1 = long long with Roz1 = absolute of X2 - X1
lines.code: long long Roz1 = abs ( X2 - X1 ) ;

lines.text: Roz2 = long long with Roz2 = absolute of Y2 - Y1
lines.code: long long Roz2 = abs ( Y2 - Y1 ) ;

lines.text: Wsp = long long with Wsp = Roz1 - absolute of Roz1 - Roz2
lines.code: long long Wsp = Roz1 - abs ( Roz1 - Roz2 ) ;

lines.text: Oddz = long long with Oddz = max of Roz2 and Roz1 - Wsp
lines.code: long long Oddz = max ( Roz2 , Roz1 ) - Wsp ;
